dc_title_s: (Four sheets) A map of the United States of North America : drawn from a number of critical researches.
dc_description_s: Greenwich.;Relief shown using hachures.;"Published as the Act directs by A. Arrowsmith, No. 10 Soho Square, Jan 1st, 1796, additions to 1802.";"Additions to 1819.";Includes text and ill. of Niagara Falls.;Karpinski, L. Bibliography of the printed maps of Michigan 1804-1880, no. 58.;1 map on 4 sheets;hand col.;123 x 141 cm., on sheets 66 x 84 cm.;ca. 1:1,750,000
